**data/** - files of input data in JSON format

**dist/** - distribution .js files, generated by `npm run build`

**src/** - source .ts files

Install
-----------------------------------
```
$ git clone https://github.com/LebedevMA/seatMap.git
$ cd seatMap
$ npm install
$ npm run build 
```

Usage
-----------------------------------
```
$ npm run seatmap VP-BPA
```

or

```
$ node ./dist/main.js VP-BPA
```
